author: trawick
msg: threads.m4 is no more... don't include it anymore

author: rbb
msg: Put in a hack to allow us to over-ride the APR_OFF_T_FMT and APR_SSIZE_T_FMT
definitions.  I tried to use AC_TRY_COMPILE, but autoconf doesn't consider
warnings failures to compile.  So, no matter how I wrote my test program,
it generated a warning, and autoconf said it succeeded.  :-(
The code I am committing only sets the off_t fmt variable.  Let's just use
the same case statement for the ssize_t as well.

author: trawick
msg: Delete a commented-out invocation of AC_MSG_ERROR.  For some unknown
reason, this line led autoconf on OS/390 to bail out and say that it
had an internal bug because AC_MSG_ERROR is undefined.
